how do you know you're good at data science?

8 MAR 2017 • 1 min read

# On our first day at the Metis bootcamp, we were told, “At some point or another, you will all think that you don’t belong here. Don’t make the mistake of giving in to imposter syndrome. Each of you got in to this course and you are all capable of completing this course.”

They were right. Almost every day someone was worrying about how on earth they got in to the course and wasn’t everybody else just finding it so easy? And they didn’t understand a thing that was going on. Of course, in reality, everybody felt like that to some degree. This is bound to happen when you are forced to learn intensively for three months straight. You don’t have time to process everything as you go along.

This carries on into your job and for all the women in tech out there, it can be even more daunting.

POINTS TO FOCUS ON
